original_text:
God has spoken from his sanctuary:
    “In triumph I will parcel out Shechem
    and measure off the Valley of Sukkoth.
korean_text: 하나님이 그의 거룩하심으로 말씀하시되 내가 뛰놀리라 내가 세겜을 나누며 숙곳 골짜기를 측량하리라

sentences.original_text: God has spoken from his sanctuary:
In triumph I will parcel out Shechem
sentences.korean_translation: 승리 속에서 내가 세겜을 나누어 줄 것이며

sentences.original_text: and measure off the Valley of Sukkoth.
